title: List of Chelsea F.C. managers - Wikipedia
snippet: In February 2022, Thomas Tuchel led Chelsea to its first FIFA Club World Cup. He is also the coach who have won the most international titles with the club; all three of his titles were international.

title: Chelsea are delighted to welcome three new additions to our women’s team coaching staff ahead of the 2024/25 season.
snippet: Seb Brown, Dan Smith and Jack Stephens will join new head coach Sonia Bompastor’s backroom team in the positions of goalkeeping coach, assistant goalkeeping coach and opposition analyst respectively.
